details.description: Joint Entrance Examination (Main) is conducted for admission to various engineering colleges in India.
instructions: Candidates must fill the application form online at the official website.
The admit card will be available on the official website from the second week of March 2025.
Candidates are required to bring their admit card and a valid photo ID proof to the examination center.
Mobile phones, calculators, and other electronic devices are not allowed in the examination hall.
Candidates must fill out the OMR sheet carefully and completely.

Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key: Please go to the website https://jeemain.nta.nic.in/
See the Question IDs in the below sequential order for JEE (Main) — 2025 Session 1 (January 2025)
The ID next to the question under the column ‘Correct Option’ stands for the most appropriate Answer Key by NTA.
If you wish to challenge this option, you may use any one or more of the Option IDs given in the next four columns by clicking the check box
Upload supporting documents for which you can select ‘Choose File and Upload (all documents to be put in a single PDF file).
After clicking your desired option, scroll down and ‘Save your claim’ and move on to the next screen.
You will see a display of all the Option IDs you have challenged.
Click on ‘Save your claim and Pay Fee finally’.
Select the Mode of Payment and Pay a non-refundable processing fee @ % 200/- for each question challenged. Make payment through Debit / Credit Card / Net Banking.
